alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 2:36AM CDT until April 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry and Keya Paha Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ this morning to 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall over far northern portions of Cherry and Keya Paha county. Snow will combine with strong northwesterly winds producing areas of blowing and drifting snow with near whiteout conditions expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
